Job Title: Senior Manager Customer Support

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Management, Product Management

Description:
At our client, we're in search of a dynamic Senior Manager, Customer Support to lead the Customer Success Engineering (CSE) team. This pivotal role demands a balance of speed and quality, with a relentless commitment to surpassing customer expectations. As a Senior Manager, you'll lead an existing team, with opportunities to expand and enhance coverage to ensure exceptional service delivery.
Joining the team, you'll collaborate with regional managers and leverage well-documented processes while championing continuous improvement. Your focus will be on assembling an outstanding team, driving efficiency, and fostering collaborations across the organization. We're seeking someone who can scale support operations effectively, reducing customer inquiries through innovative solutions and strategic partnerships while maintaining a high standard of service.
Flexibility is key in this fast-paced role, where you'll occasionally need to adapt to unforeseen challenges. But fear not, as ample support and resources will be provided. Your passion for delivering outstanding customer experiences will be the driving force behind your success.
Key Responsibilities:Ensure delivery of exceptional customer experiences at scale.Establish measurable goals to enhance team performance continually.Work towards achieving annual targets.Handle escalated cases promptly and effectively.Collaborate with Product teams to implement feedback-driven solutions.Engage stakeholders across the organization to drive improvements.Provide mentorship and support to team members.Identify opportunities to enhance efficiency through tooling.Oversee incident communication with customers.Lead by example, demonstrating best practices within the CSE role.Recruit top-tier talent aligned with our mission.
About You:Experience balancing speed and quality in customer support.Technical leadership experience, particularly in developer support.Familiarity with globally distributed, technical support teams.Proven track record in setting and managing KPIs and growth plans.Ability to drive efficiencies in scaling support operations.Desire to collaborate cross-functionally, especially with Product teams.Commitment to mentoring and empowering team members.Confident decision-maker in fast-paced environments.Strong technical background in modern application development and deployment.5+ years of experience in customer-facing or technical documentation roles.
10xCompanyJobs tracks jobs at a curated list of companies that have the potential to 10x their value.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
